aboutRole.title: About My Role
aboutRole.content: Throughout my professional experience, I have helped organizations adopt a data-driven culture, driving informed strategic decision-making and optimizing business performance. My approach combines business analysis, data intelligence, and strategic planning, with the goal of connecting key metrics to actual business outcomes.

whatIDo.title: What I Do
items: Promote a data-driven decision-making culture, training leaders and teams in the use of analytical frameworks and visualization tools.
Act as the owner of performance indicators, ensuring consistent definitions aligned with strategic objectives.
Lead strategic analyses combining financial and operational data to identify growth and efficiency opportunities.
Develop executive reports and insights that explain performance and key drivers behind business metrics.
Design and maintain performance measurement models to monitor strategy execution.
Support planning and forecasting processes, ensuring alignment between financial goals and long-term objectives.
Ensure operational risk management and compliance, fostering a culture of accountability and control.
Build and manage high-performance teams, driving an inclusive environment of continuous development.

experience: Proven experience in Banking, Government, Retail, Telecommunications and Business Process Optimization.
systemsThinking: Professional with systems thinking, focused on:

systemsThinkingPoints.1: Diagnosing structural problems in organizations that hinder efficiency.
systemsThinkingPoints.2: Translating technical challenges into simple, measurable, and scalable solutions.
systemsThinkingPoints.3: Designing technology adoption processes that maximize customer value.

strategicMapItems: Frameworks for prioritizing business problems during pre-sales stages.
Conversational scripts or sequences to understand the client context and co-design solutions.
Examples of real cases where the sales process transformed the client's process (Slack, Atlassian, Notion, Deel, etc.).
objectiveItems: Identify opportunities for improvement in organizations.
Position solutions as enablers of change.
Replace commercial speeches with proposals based on logic, evidence, and co-creation.
